data.text: @mejohnnaylor @JeffJRosica @KeyCodeMedia @Avid Jeff is ageless.  what about Mike?
@mcavkcm @JeffJRosica @KeyCodeMedia @Avid Jeff looks exactly the same as he did in 2006. What’s your secret? 😁

@mcavkcm @KeyCodeMedia @Avid Thanks Mike. Was so great to see you today! Last time we were in person was the beginning of pandemic. Let’s hope this is the beginning of the end! Thank you for all the terrific support by @KeyCodeMedia. Our success is not possible without premier partners like KCM! #TeamAvid
